name: The Streamer's Dilemma
description:
Ludum Dare 50

Theme: Delay the Inevitable

You are a streamer, trying to stream normally, but there’s a catch: Your dog.  You have to manage your stream – and all the random events that come with it – while also keeping an eye on your dog, who has a very small bladder and has to be taken out on a walk constantly.  Keep your stream alive, talk to chat and host events, as well your actual stream content – but don’t take your eye off the dog, either, or he’ll pee all over your dining room floor.  Can you keep a clean room and a hype stream going until the end?

Make it to the end of the stream with a high score and a clean floor!

Gameplay

Arrow Keys - Move
Shift - Run
Space/Enter - Interact

Mechanics

Manager your stream content and the random events that come up while also keeping an eye on your dog and the timer at the top.

Dog - Take your dog out for walks before the timer reaches zero
Streams - Respond to chat and host events while going through your stream content.  But don't let your streamer score drop below 0!
